api.name: ObThemeService
api.usage: Allows live changing to the theme and font

variables.name: theme$
variables.text: An observable that emits each time the main theme is changed.

variables.name: font$
variables.text: An observable that emits each time the main font is changed.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.text: Sets a theme, e.g. loads the corresponding CSS and adds it the the documents's head tag. In case of a string, the full path of the theme has to be provided

methods.name: setFont
methods.text: Sets a font, e.g. loads the corresponding CSS and adds it the the head.

methods.name: isMaterial
methods.text: Returns true if the current theme is Material, and false otherwise.
